form.title: Subscription form and On-Site Tracking
form.description: Integrate your forms very easily: Log in to Doppler and go to Lists > Forms > Create Form. Choose the Pop-up format, design it and publish it. Click on “Copy code”, paste it below, select “Enable Form” and click on “Save”.

scriptEnabled.title: Activate On-Site Tracking in the VTEX store
scriptEnabled.description: To activate On-Site Tracking in your VTEX account, follow these steps: Log in to Doppler and go to Control Panel > On-Site Tracking & Push Notifications, click on “Enable On-Site Tracking”, configure and verify your domain. Then, click on this page on “Activate On-Site Tracking in store”.
